participants.name: Andy Arminio
participants.title: Sr IT Architecture Analyst at UnitedHealth Group

messages.message: I am looking for a job in Flagstaff to no avail. Where are you working now?
Optum (part of UHG) in Denver. Good luck with your job hunt, Flag's a tough market.
What do you think of this?

The colored dots thing for years of experience looks nice, but it's hard to read at a glance. For your bullet points on your employment history, I'd suggest focusing on accomplishments/things built and use active phrasing and numbers if you've got them. Like, instead of "Automated security scanner/ethical hacking presented in vibrant UI/UX.", something like "Created security scanner covering 5000+ vulnerabilities" or something to that effect.
A couple people have had a hard time with the dots like they try and compare them to actual years as if it matters. It's really just to get people to read it.
